    <![endif]--><link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="/phstyles/style-5pcpem1f2w.min.css">        <script>
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

    dataLayer.push({"gtm.start": new Date().getTime(), event: "gtm.js"});

<script async="" src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=GTM-TKS335"></script>

                    <script async="" src="https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js"></script>

<script>
    window.googletag = window.googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
</script>

<script>
    window.renderGPT = function (pageSlots, renderStrategy) {
        if (window.EM && EM.cookie_policy && EM.cookie_policy.cookies) {
            var googleAdManagerPolicyCookie = (EM.cookie_policy.cookies || []).filter(function (cookie) {
                return cookie.name === 'Google Doubleclick';
            });

            if (googleAdManagerPolicyCookie[0] && googleAdManagerPolicyCookie[0].is_accepted === false)
                return;
        }

        googletag.cmd.push(function () {
            googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
            googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
            googletag.enableServices();
        });

        googletag.cmd.push(function (pageSlots) {
            Object.keys(pageSlots).forEach(function (slotName) {
                googletag.display(slotName);
            });
        }.bind(null, pageSlots));

        googletag.cmd.push(function (pageSlots, renderStrategy) {
            if (renderStrategy)
                renderStrategy(pageSlots);

            if (Object.keys(pageSlots).length === 0) return;

            var observer = new IntersectionObserver(function (entries, observer) {
                var renderSlots = [];

                entries.forEach(function (entry) {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting === false) return;
                    observer.unobserve(entry.target);
                    renderSlots.push(pageSlots[entry.target.id]);
                    delete pageSlots[entry.target.id];
                });

                if (pageSlots.length === 0) observer.disconnect();

                if (renderSlots.length > 0)
                    googletag.pubads().refresh(renderSlots, {changeCorrelator: false});
            });

            var slotNames = Object.keys(pageSlots);
            var slotEls = document.querySelectorAll('#' + slotNames.join(',#'));

            slotEls.forEach(function (slotEl) {
                observer.observe(slotEl);
            });
        }.bind(null, pageSlots, renderStrategy));
    }
</script>

<script>
    document.addEventListener('PHMegamenuDepartmentLoaded', function (e) {
        var departmentId = e.data.departmentId;
        if (!departmentId) return;

                if ([1696, 768, 651].indexOf(departmentId) > -1) return;

        googletag.cmd.push(function () {
            var unitPath = '/296121929/Megamenu';
            var slotName = 'tpb_megamenu_' + departmentId;

            var slotEl = document.getElementById(slotName);
            if (!slotEl) return;

            var slot = googletag
                .defineSlot(unitPath, 'fluid', slotName)
                .setTargeting('dep_id', departmentId)
                .setTargeting('position', 'megamenu' + departmentId)
                .addService(googletag.pubads());

            googletag.display(slotName);

            googletag.pubads().refresh([slot]);
        });
    });
</script><script>
    (function () {
        function renderStrategy(pageSlots) {
            (function () {
                var baseSlotNamePrefix = 'tpb_homepage_';

                var slots = {};

                Object.keys(pageSlots).forEach(function (slotName) {
                    if (slotName.substring(0, baseSlotNamePrefix.length) === baseSlotNamePrefix) {
                        slots[slotName] = pageSlots[slotName];
                        delete pageSlots[slotName];
                    }
                });

                var slotNames = Object.keys(slots);

                if (slotNames.length === 0) return;

                var renderSlots = [];

                for (var i = 1; i <= 2; i++) {
                    var renderSlot = slots[baseSlotNamePrefix + i];
                    if (renderSlot === undefined) break;
                    renderSlots.push(renderSlot);
                }

                googletag.pubads().refresh(renderSlots, {changeCorrelator: false});

                if (slotNames.length === 1) return;

                var bannerCarouselEl = document.querySelector('.js-banner-carousel');

                if (!bannerCarouselEl || !bannerCarouselEl.PH_Widget) return;

                var bannerCarouselWidget = bannerCarouselEl.PH_Widget;

                var handleDotChange = function (i) {
                    if (renderSlots.length === slotNames.length) {
                        bannerCarouselWidget.off('dot-change', handleDotChange);
                        return;
                    }

                    i++;
                    if (renderSlots.indexOf(slots[baseSlotNamePrefix + i]) > -1) i++;
                    var renderSlot = slots[baseSlotNamePrefix + i];

                    if (renderSlot === undefined) return;
                    if (renderSlots.indexOf(renderSlot) > -1) return;

                    renderSlots.push(renderSlot);
                    googletag.pubads().refresh([renderSlot], {changeCorrelator: false});
                };

                bannerCarouselWidget.on('dot-change', handleDotChange);
            })();
        }

        window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            var pageSlots = {};

            (function () {
                var baseUnitPathPrefix = '/296121929/Slider_Home_';
                if (location.hostname === 'm.emag.ro') {
                    baseUnitPathPrefix += 'Mbl_';
                }

                var baseSlotNamePrefix = 'tpb_homepage_';

                for (var i = 1; i <= 6; i++) {
                    var unitPath = baseUnitPathPrefix + i;
                    var slotName = baseSlotNamePrefix + i;

                    var slotEl = document.getElementById(slotName);
                    if (!slotEl) continue;

                    pageSlots[slotName] = null;

                    googletag.cmd.push(function (unitPath, slotName, i) {
                        pageSlots[slotName] = googletag
                            .defineSlot(unitPath, 'fluid', slotName)
                            .setTargeting('position', 'hp_slot_' + i)
                            .addService(googletag.pubads());
                    }.bind(null, unitPath, slotName, i));
                }
            })();

            (function () {
                var baseUnitPathPrefix = '/296121929/Home_department_c';
                var baseSlotNamePrefix = 'tpb-home-department-';
                var baseSuffixes = {
                    1: [11, 12, 21, 22, 31, 32],
                    2: [1, 2, 3],
                    3: [1, 2, 3]
                };

                Object.keys(baseSuffixes).forEach(function (suffix) {
                    var unitPathPrefix = baseUnitPathPrefix + suffix + '_';
                    var slotNamePrefix = baseSlotNamePrefix + suffix + '-';

                    baseSuffixes[suffix].forEach(function (suffix) {
                        var unitPath = unitPathPrefix + suffix;
                        var slotName = slotNamePrefix + suffix;

                        var slotEl = document.getElementById(slotName);
                        if (!slotEl) return;

                        pageSlots[slotName] = null;

                        googletag.cmd.push(function (unitPath, slotName, slotEl, suffix) {
                            pageSlots[slotName] = googletag
                                .defineSlot(unitPath, 'fluid', slotName)
                                .setTargeting('dep_id', slotEl.getAttribute('data-department-id'))
                                .setTargeting('position', 'home_departments_slot_' + suffix)
                                .addService(googletag.pubads());
                        }.bind(null, unitPath, slotName, slotEl, suffix));
                    });
                });
            })();

            (function () {
                var baseUnitPathPrefix = '/296121929/home_horizontal_';
                var baseSlotNamePrefix = 'tpb-home-banner-';

                for (var i = 1; i <= 3; i++) {
                    var unitPath = baseUnitPathPrefix + i;
                    var slotName = baseSlotNamePrefix + i;

                    var slotEl = document.getElementById(slotName);
                    if (!slotEl) continue;

                    pageSlots[slotName] = null;

                    googletag.cmd.push(function (unitPath, slotName, i) {
                        pageSlots[slotName] = googletag
                            .defineSlot(unitPath, 'fluid', slotName)
                            .setTargeting('position', 'tpb_home_banner_slot_' + i)
                            .addService(googletag.pubads());
                    }.bind(null, unitPath, slotName, i));
                }
            })();

            window.renderGPT(pageSlots, renderStrategy);
        });
    })();
</script>

            var dataLayer=dataLayer||[];!function(){var t={};t.push=function(t){dataLayer.push(t)},t.getProductInfo=function(e){oldSiteAjax.tracking.getProductInfo({part_number_key:e}).then(function(e){e.status&&(console.log(e),t.push(e.data))})},t.handleGeneralEvent=function(e){var n=t.getEventObject(e);n&&t.push(n)},t.getEventObject=function(t){var e=t;if("string"==typeof e)try{e=JSON.parse(e)}catch(t){}return"object"==typeof e&&e&&"event"in e?e:null},EM.DatalayerManager=t}();
        </script>
    
    <script>
        EM.mobile = false;
        EM.CDN = "s12emagst.akamaized.net";
        EM.sapi_endpoint = "https:\/\/sapi.emag.ro";
        EM.old_site_endpoint = "https:\/\/www.emag.ro";

        EM.locale = "ro";

        EM.assets_url = 'https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/assets/ro/images';

        EM.is_tracking_enabled = true;

            unique_token: String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000)

                    </li><li data-id="23" class="megamenu-list-department js-megamenu-list-department" data-modified="1586883792"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="js-megamenu-list-department-link gtm_31vgamc">

<input type="hidden" class="em-vars" name="send_sms_token" value="<input type=&quot;hidden&quot; name=&quot;action_token&quot; value=&quot;bd94b991dc6cf0c2886e8da07f64d4b905277c78&quot; />"><script>

<script type="text/javascript">
window.user_labels = [];

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
    //run ab here, ex: runAb(12);
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>
        </div>
    </div>
</nav>

    <div class="container">
        <div class="navbar-aux-content collapse navbar-collapse">
            <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-left">
                <li class="active main-megamenu-trigger" data-trigger="both">
                    <div class="navbar-aux-content__departments"><i class="em em-burger"></i> Produse                    <span class="sr-only">(deschide megameniul)</span></div>
                </li>
            </ul>

                            <ul class="dropdown-menu" aria-labelledby="navbar-aux-dropdown">

                        <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-left">
                                                            <li class="font-size-sm visible-sm visible-md visible-lg">

            </div><script type="text/html">Descopera toate opțiunile de finanțare și plată a comenzilor tale la eMAG și alege cea mai bună ofertă de rate fără dobândă!

    <section class="page-section">
    <div class="container pad-sep-xs"><div class="widget-department">
    <p class="widget-subtitle">Cumparaturi pentru acasa, fara sa treci pe la casa.</p>
    <h2 class="page-section-title wd-title">Necesare zi de zi</h2>
    <div class="wd-benefits"><a href="javascript:;" class="no-underline" data-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-align="S N" data-ph-class-name="widget-benefits-tooltip">Deschidere colet la livrare</a><script type="text/html">Stii ce-ai comandat, verifica ce ai primit! Poti solicita curierului care iti face livrarea sa deschida coletul ca sa vezi daca produsele corespund descrierii de pe site.</script><a href="javascript:;" class="no-underline" data-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-align="S N" data-ph-class-name="widget-benefits-tooltip">Metode de livrare</a><script type="text/html">Ai libertatea sa alegi modalitatea de livrare care-ti convine: la easybox, prin curier, ridicare din showroomsau de la oficiul postal</script><a href="javascript:;" class="no-underline" data-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-align="S N" data-ph-class-name="widget-benefits-tooltip">Retur</a><script type="text/html"></script></div>
    <div class="panel clearfix mrg-btm-none"><div class="wd-1 wd-links wd-links-0"><ul><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/detergenti-rufe/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_1">Detergent rufe</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/sampon-par/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_2">Sampon de par</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/geluri-dus/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_3">Geluri de dus</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/scutece-chilotei/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_4">Scutece si chilotei</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/lapte-praf-bebelusi/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_5">Lapte praf bebelusi</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/cafea/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_6">Cafea</a></li><li class="wd-link-title-1"><a href="/hrana-pentru-caini/c?ref=hp_dept_link_10_7">Hrana pentru caini</a></li></ul></div><div class="wd-1 wd-links wd-links-1"><ul><li><a href="/detergenti-rufe/brand/ariel/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_1">Ariel</a></li><li><a href="/aparate-ras-clasice/brand/gillette/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_2">Gillette</a></li><li><a href="/scutece-chilotei/brand/Pampers/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_3">Pampers</a></li><li><a href="/mascara/brand/maybelline/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_4">Maybelline</a></li><li><a href="/sampon-par/brand/head-shoulders/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_5">Head&amp;Shoulders</a></li><li><a href="/lapte-praf-bebelusi/brand/nestle/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_6">Nestle</a></li><li><a href="/hrana-pentru-caini/brand/pedigree/c?ref=hp_dept_quick-nav_10_7">Pedigree</a></li></ul></div><div class="wd-3 wd-banners wd-banners-2"><div class="dfp-banner-container js-dfp-banner-container dfp-home-department-col-3" id="tpb-home-department-3-3" data-department-id="23" data-fallback-img-src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/db/44/65937.jpg" data-fallback-img-title="Promotii placi video" data-fallback-url="/placi_video/filter/tip-placa-f2654,gaming-v7299/c" data-fallback-ref="hp_dept_banner_10_3" data-fallback-target="_self"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

    <section class="page-section">
    <div class="container pad-sep-xs"><div class="widget-newsletter">
    <img data-src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/newsletter-bg-resized.png" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" alt="image" class="lozad hidden-xs hidden-sm hidden-md widget-newsletter-bg">
    <div class="widget-newsletter-content">
        <h3 class="h1 mrg-sep-none">Abonează-te la newsletter eMAG și află de reducerile cu timp limitat!</h3>
        <p class="small">Prin abonarea la newsletter-ul eMAG confirm că am peste 16 ani.</p>

        <form class="form pad-top-sm" action="/widget-subscribe-nl" novalidate="true">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="form-group form-group-sm col-md-4">
                    <label class="sr-only">Nume</label>
                    <input type="text" name="name" class="form-control" placeholder="Nume" required="" minlength="3" data-vm-min="Numele trebuie să fie de cel puțin 3 caractere lungime">
                </div>
                <div class="form-group form-group-sm col-md-4">
                    <label class="sr-only">Email</label>
                    <input type="email" name="email" class="form-control" placeholder="Email" required="" data-v-email="">
                </div>
                <div class="form-group form-group-sm col-md-4">
                    <button class="btn btn-danger btn-sm btn-block js-recaptcha-button">Aboneaza-ma!</button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="js-recaptcha-badge" data-recaptcha-key="6LeGV3QUAAAAAE4aM2KFz3vZNzfxupNlWhRWJ8Ao"><div class="grecaptcha-badge" data-style="bottomright" style="width: 256px; height: 60px; position: fixed; visibility: hidden; display: block; transition: right 0.3s ease 0s; bottom: 14px; right: -186px; box-shadow: gray 0px 0px 5px; border-radius: 2px; overflow: hidden;"><div class="grecaptcha-logo"><iframe src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/anchor?ar=1&amp;k=6LeGV3QUAAAAAE4aM2KFz3vZNzfxupNlWhRWJ8Ao&amp;co=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZW1hZy5ybzo0NDM.&amp;hl=ro&amp;v=-wV2EAWEOTlEtZh4vNQtn3H1&amp;size=invisible&amp;cb=sv2v6r195i5h" width="256" height="60" role="presentation" name="a-hnv33lrb5jsu" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" sandbox="allow-forms allow-popups allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-modals allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox"></iframe></div><div class="grecaptcha-error"></div><textarea id="g-recaptcha-response" name="g-recaptcha-response" class="g-recaptcha-response" style="width: 250px; height: 40px; border: 1px solid rgb(193, 193, 193); margin: 10px 25px; padding: 0px; resize: none; display: none;"></textarea></div><iframe style="display: none;"></iframe></div>
            </div>

        <div class="card-body product-title-zone"><div class="product-title"></div></div>
        <div class="card-body"><div class="star-rating-container"></div></div><div class="card-body"><p class="product-old-price"></p>
                    <p class="product-new-price"></p></div></div></div><div class="card-item js-card-item"><div class="card card-shimmer"><div class="card-heading">
            <div class="thumbnail-wrapper ratio-4by3"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="card-body product-title-zone"><div class="product-title"></div></div>
        <div class="card-body"><div class="star-rating-container"></div></div><div class="card-body"><p class="product-old-price"></p>
                    <p class="product-new-price"></p></div></div></div></div>
            </div>
        </div></div></div><a class="ph-left-margin" href="#"></a><a class="ph-right-margin" href="#"></a></div>
</div></div>
</section>
<section class="page-section pad-sep-sm" id="mktp-sell-with-emag">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="mktp-banner-sell-with-emag">
            <img data-src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/banner_mktp_copy.png" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" alt="eMAG Marketplace" class="lozad hidden-xs hidden-sm mktp-banner-bg">

            <div class="mktp-content">
                <img class="lozad mktp-logo-img" data-src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/all/static-upload/mktp-logo.png" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" alt="eMAG Marketplace">

                <h2 class="h1 mrg-top-none">Creste-ti afacerea!</h2>

                        Vreau sa vand pe eMAG                    </a>
